2 #permalink Base

Styling of default html elements.

2.1 #permalink Typography

Base styling for typograhpy.

The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog. The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog. The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.

The bold fox jumps over the italic dog. The linked parrot just watch. The bold fox jumps over the italic dog. The linked parrot just watch.

HTML 
<h1>Heading 1</h1>
<h2>Heading 2</h2>
<h3>Heading 3</h3>
<h4>Heading 4</h4>
<h5>Heading 5</h5>
<h6>Heading 6</h6>
<p>The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog. The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog. The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.</p>
<p>The <strong>bold fox</strong> jumps over the <em>italic dog</em>. The <a href="#">linked parrot</a> just watch. The <strong>bold fox</strong> jumps over the <em>italic dog</em>. The <a href="#">linked parrot</a> just watch.</p>

2.2 #permalink Table

Base styling for typograhpy.

Header Header Header Header
Content Content Content Content
HTML 
<table>
    <thead>
        <tr>
            <th>Header</th>
            <th>Header</th>
            <th>Header</th>
            <th>Header</th>
        </tr>
    </thead>
    <tbody>
        <tr>
            <td>Content</td>
            <td>Content</td>
            <td>Content</td>
            <td>Content</td>
        </tr>
    </tbody>
</table>

2.3 #permalink Forms

Base styling for forms.

Legend Fields here
HTML 
<label>
    Label
    <input type="text" placeholder="Placeholder"/>
</label>
<label>
    Disabled
    <input type="text" disabled/>
</label>
<label>
    Label
    <textarea></textarea>
</label>
<label><input type="checkbox"/> Label</label>
<label><input type="checkbox" checked/> Label</label>
<label><input type="checkbox" disabled/> Disabled</label>
<label><input type="radio" name="test"/> Label</label>
<label><input type="radio" name="test" checked/> Label</label>
<label><input type="radio" name="test" disabled/> Disabled</label>
<label>
    Label
    <select>
      <option>Option 1</option>
      <option>Option 2</option>
    </select>
</label>
<label>
    Disabled
    <select disabled>
      <option>Option 1</option>
      <option>Option 2</option>
    </select>
</label>
<fieldset>
    <legend>Legend</legend>
    Fields here
</fieldset>
<button type="button">Button</button>
<button type="submit">Submit</button>
